Gothic1Path: ---Defaults to Steam installation path (PCVR) or files/Gothic1 (Mobile VR)---
Gothic2Path: ---Defaults to Steam installation path (PCVR) or files/Gothic2 (Mobile VR)---
LogLevel: ---Set log level to one of these values: Message/Warning/Error. Default: Warning---
LogCategories: --Filter categories as list via colon/semicolon. Default: ALL--
